text: Ya ku waÉ—anda aka bai wa Littafi! Ku yi imani da abinda Muka saukar, yana mai gaskatawa ga abin da yake tare da ku, tun gabanin Mu shafe wasu fuskoki, sa'an nan Mu mayar da su a kan bayayyakinsu, ko Mu la'ane su kamar yadda Muka la'ani masu Asabar. Kuma umurnin Allah ya kasance abin aikatawa
